Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 96.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to authorize extension of time limitation for a FERC-issued hydroelectric license.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a certain licensee, to extend until May 31, 2001, the time required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project. Directs the Commission to reinstate any expired license for such project and extend until May 31, 2001, the time required for the licensee to commence project construction.

titles.title: A bill to authorize extension of time limitation for a FERC-issued hydroelectric license.
